ygData.subject: RE: Paw of Opalla and Desperate request for aid.
ygData.msgSnippet: The Paw will *NEVER* be a dime a dozen.  The gold ring is next to impossible to get.  I have been trying to get one for myself and auctioning for one for at
ygData.messageBody:
The Paw will *NEVER* be "a dime a dozen." The gold ring is next to
impossible to get. I have been trying to get one for myself and auctioning
for one for at least 2 months with no success.

As for your problem with where to fight, I would suggest Aviaks or Crocs.
You will get good exp and not die as often. Personally I LOVED Unrest from
level 16 to 25 and did not die very often, but you have to get a good group
to be successful there. And do NOT pull there, go into a room and camp it
unless there are less than 30 people in the zone.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

> From: Cal <horselord@...>
>
> So basically those of us who still have to rely on Smiting are screwed....
> bloody HELL... Was hoping that this might be an item I could possibly
> get...
>
> Add in the fact that now everyone knows about the quest ....
>
> by the time i manage to get the Paw they'll be a dime a dozen like
> bloodforge hammers.... so much for having a semi rare item...
>
> I've already wasted 10PP trying to get p34 for the Testament as well...
> but I'm dubious to him so I doubt I'm gonna get anything...
>
> ok, new topic....
>
> Where can a 21st level Cleric(human) possibly go to get some XP... I'm
> sooo tired of pull and kill in Permafrost and Unrest... with the all the
> deaths I'm barely gaining XP.... I lose like 3/4 to a full bub of XP
> everytime I die... I've been a half a bub from 22 three times now
> and RIGHT
> now I'm at less than a bub into 21... for level 20 I could hunt
> scarecrows
> to make up for the XP I lost in Perma... but now I get jack from em...
>
> I've tried the undead at lake rathe, but it's usually camped like
> high holy
> hell and everyone is so freakin obsessive there... I accidently Expulse a
> db some guy is walking towards and he chews my head off for 20 minutes on
> shout... telling everyone I'm a KSer... right, sure, a freakin CLERIC
> KSing... HAHAHAHAHA
>
> Help Please! getting SO frustrated....
